name: Death Percent 2: On the Edge of Destruction [Project 2021-9]
name_original: Death Percent 2: On the Edge of Destruction [Project 2021-9]
description:
Death is not the end in this fast-paced action platformer. Race your way to the top of a tower before time runs out. Death isn't enough to stop you, keep pushing forward in Ghost form until you reach the end. Can you shave enough seconds off to battle the final boss and save your home?

Tips:

You need to save 30 second of time cumulatively across all levels to face the final boss.

Controls?

R to quick restart level

WASD and Arrow keys to move

Click to attack (Mouse to aim)

Up / W / Space to jump

What is Project 2021?

Over the course of this year, I am trying to tell a story between all of my games. While you do not need to play any prior or following games to enjoy this, the lore does build. Can you piece together the story that is being told?

Other Cannon Games This Year:

  1. Out Of Time
  2. Armor Of God
  3. Death Percent
  4. Rouge Royale
  5. A Name Is Earned
  6. Last Man Standing
  7. Joining Forces
  8. Second Son
  9. Death Percent 2
  10. More Coming Soon ...
